title: 847 add ability to send images to the assistant when using ollama

body:
add support for a single image to be passed to ollama using a model that supports vision (i.e. Llama3.2.vision, Llava)

example usage: [examples/ollama_inquire_about_image.rb](https://github.com/patterns-ai-core/langchainrb/pull/870/files#diff-299ccac4b54ae4df1f272f95e23a0fbaff3b54748c12b9f390d41e9dc70929a6)
